newsitem.title: USA: QCS Corp appoints Myhre CEO & president.
newsitem.headline: QCS Corp appoints Myhre CEO & president.

text.p: Electronic commerce service provider QCS Corp said on Wednesday it appointed Todd Myhre as chief executive officer and president and had also appointed him to the Board of Directors.
In his new positions, Myhre will succeed the company founder, Marcel van Heesewijk who remains as chairman of the board and executive VP of business strategies and alliances.
For the last year, Myhre has been an international business consultant assisting small companies. Prior to that, he was CEO of Genus Inc.
